extraDescription: Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat (TBS) requires SAP Programmer, Technical Analyst and Technical Architect resources on an as and when requested basis to support TBS with multiple SAP projects. The resources will assist with all project phases including planning, design, implementation, development, integration, and maintenance.
comments: This contract was competitively sourced.This contract is a multi-year contract.For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department.
